definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: He has been asked to adjudicate in the disagreement between the city council and the citizens.
sentences.chinese: 请他出面仲裁市议会和市民之间的分歧。

sentences.english: Lenard Wilkins, an elder member of the city council was also in attendance.
sentences.chinese: 参与狗肉美食节的一位市议会的前辈级人物。

sentences.english: The Amsterdam City Council approved the plan about two weeks ago by an overwhelming 43-2 majority.
sentences.chinese: 市议会在两周前以43比2悬殊票距通过了这项计画。

sentences.english: The city council had to back off from its criticism of the utility department.
sentences.chinese: 市议会必须建勤对公用事业部门的批评。

sentences.english: The doubt of the profit etc. of the business was put out by the municipal assemblyman .
sentences.chinese: 从市议会议员关于事业的核算性等疑问被发出了。

sentences.english: Speculation is mounting over who will run for speaker and vice speaker of the Taipei and Kaohsiung city councils .
sentences.chinese: 谁将角逐北高两市议会正副议长宝座的臆测频频。

sentences.english: Boccanegra urges the city council to preserve peace with Venice.
sentences.chinese: 波卡涅拉促请市议会维护与威尼斯的和平。
高级市政官在市议会主持事务。

sentences.english: In Saint Paul, the largest city in Brazil, the delegation paid a courtesy call on the city council and government.
sentences.chinese: 在巴西圣保罗市，代表团分别拜会了市议会和政府。

sentences.english: The city council voted against the zoning proposal.
sentences.chinese: 市议会投票反对都市分区计划的提议。

sentences.english: "Hell, they got it past the city council, " Graham said.
sentences.chinese: “狗日的，他们通过了市议会，”哥兰说。

sentences.english: The council has been squandering the ratepayers' money.
sentences.chinese: 市议会一直在挥霍房地产纳税人的金钱。

sentences.english: He continues to do battle with the city council.
sentences.chinese: 他继续与市议会进行斗争。

sentences.english: The country council get to hand off since its criticism of the utility department.
sentences.chinese: 市议会必需建勤对公用事业部门的批评。

sentences.english: The town council vote for an abridgement of the mayor's power.
sentences.chinese: 市议会投票赞成限制市长的权力。

sentences.english: The City Council allotted  money for a housing project.
sentences.chinese: 市议会为一项建房计划拨了款。

definition: lower chamber (of legislative body)/lower house/the House of Commons
member of the US House of Representatives
capital territory/Australian Capital Territory (ACT) around Canberra 堪培拉
British Columbia, province of Canada (loanword from "BC")
